turns.content: Robert Anton Wilson was an American author, philosopher, and futurist, known for his work in the fields of psychology, neuroscience, and consciousness. He is perhaps best known for his series of books known as the "Illuminatus!" trilogy, which explores themes of conspiracy, occultism, and alternative history. Wilson was also a prominent figure in the counterculture movement of the 1960s and 1970s, and was known for his unconventional and eclectic views on a wide range of topics, including politics, religion, and science. He was a popular speaker and writer, and his work has been widely influential in the fields of psychology, philosophy, and science fiction. Wilson passed away in 2007.
